SubjectOrder Amending Schedules l and lV to the Weights and Measures Act
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULES I AND IV TO THE WEIGHTS AND MEASURES ACT in order to modify the classification of two units of measurement in Schedule I , and update the reference standards listed in Schedule IV of the Weights and Measures Act.
